• Minor bug fixes
Updated version for IOS 10.
Updated version for IOS 10.
Following planned security updates we have a new app ready to download and recommend you update as soon as possible.
Following planned security updates we have a new app ready to download and recommend you update as soon as possible.
In our first update of the year we’ve introduced Touch ID Login, added an interactive, feature based demo, improved the overall design of the app and removed the Paym and Branch Locator features.
In our first update of the year we’ve introduced Touch ID Login, added an interactive, feature based demo, improved the overall design of the app and removed the Paym and Branch Locator features.
We've made some improvements to the first time enrolment journey and fixed some bugs that were causing the app to become unresponsive.
We've made some improvements to the first time enrolment journey and fixed some bugs that were causing the app to become unresponsive.
This release includes improvements to enrolment and compatibility with iOS 11.
This release includes improvements to enrolment and compatibility with iOS 11.
This release includes bug fixes and improvements.
This release includes bug fixes and improvements.
This release includes improvements and other bug fixes, and introduces 'Be Secure', which can soon be used to authorise payments initiated on the web.
This release includes improvements and other bug fixes, and introduces 'Be Secure', which can soon be used to authorise payments initiated on the web.

A new year and a fresh new update to the app.

You can now use the app to deposit cheques to your personal current and savings accounts. Just take a picture, fill in the details, and the funds will be in your account in two days (assuming the cheque is paid).

Not only that, you can now order a new chequebook directly from the app. Who said cheques were on their way out?

We've also done some work behind the scenes to speed up the payments screens.

A new year and a fresh new update to the app.

You can now use the app to deposit cheques to your personal current and savings accounts. Just take a picture, fill in the details, and the funds will be in your account in two days (assuming the cheque is paid).

Not only that, you can now order a new chequebook directly from the app. Who said cheques were on their way out?

We've also done some work behind the scenes to speed up the payments screens.

This update introduces new alerts to let you know when to top up your account for a payment to go through and to avoid possible charges. (Personal accounts only)

You can also now change the order your accounts appear on the main screen, so your main accounts are at the top.

We are launching a new feature called ‘Payments Status and History’, which allows you to view the outcomes of one-off payments and transfers that you have made, e.g. ‘paid’ and ‘pending’. This applies to payments made since January 2018 on your Mobile as well as using Internet Banking.

We are launching a new feature called ‘Payments Status and History’, which allows you to view the outcomes of one-off payments and transfers that you have made, e.g. ‘paid’ and ‘pending’. This applies to payments made since January 2018 on your Mobile as well as using Internet Banking.

We are launching a new feature called ‘Payments Status and History’, which allows you to view the outcomes of one-off payments and transfers that you have made, e.g. ‘paid’ and ‘pending’. This applies to payments made since January 2018 on your Mobile as well as using Internet Banking.

You will also now be able to access service quality indicators from the 'More' menu to help you more easily compare current account providers.

This release allows you to see IBAN and BIC information in your ‘Account Details’ screen for savings and current accounts, and includes compatibility with iOS 12.

In this release, we have included some bug fixes and minor enhancements, including making terminology clearer and more intuitive.
In this release, we have included some bug fixes and minor enhancements, including making terminology clearer and more intuitive.

New in this release, if you have a business as well as a personal account with us, is the ability to add a business profile and choose either your personal or business profile when you log into your Mobile Banking App. We have also made it easier to find the Cheque Deposit option.

New in this release, if you have a business as well as a personal account with us, is the ability to add a business profile and choose either your personal or business profile when you log into your Mobile Banking App. We have also made it easier to find the Cheque Deposit option.
Bug fixes and minor enhancements
Bug fixes and minor enhancements
In this release we introduce a new feature which allows you to rename your accounts to something more memorable. You will also find it easier to manage your alerts with improved navigation.
In this release we introduce a new feature which allows you to rename your accounts to something more memorable. You will also find it easier to manage your alerts with improved navigation.
We have increased the period for viewing your Digital Statements from 7 months to 24 months. In addition, we have been fixed bugs and improving the overall performance of your mobile banking app.
We have increased the period for viewing your Digital Statements from 7 months to 24 months. In addition, we have been fixed bugs and improving the overall performance of your mobile banking app.

In response to customer demand, we have made it really easy to find your recurring payments as well as a list of your payees. What’s more, you can now choose to log out of your app automatically when you close your app. In addition, we have been fixing bugs and improving the overall performance of your mobile banking app.

We’re updating our app regularly with new features, bringing you brighter money with every release. Our latest version has some key updates.

- Lost, stolen or damaged debit card? You’re now able to tell us from within the app
- Tweaks and improvements to the in-app experience, plus some bug fixes

Your banking just got a little bit brighter. We update the Clydesdale Bank app regularly to bring you the best experience. With this release we've fixed a few bugs, and also made a couple more tweaks and service improvements.
